name: Fish Tank, 2.4 Gallon Fish Aquarium, Fish Tank Starter kit with Smart Humidifier, Temperature Display, 7-Color Lighting, 3 in 1 Quiet Pump with Filteration & Oxygenation & Circulation
short_description: Smart Multi-Functional Aquarium：2.4 gallon fish tank kit with self-circulating 3-in-1 pump and adjustable 7 colors lighting system, includes aromatherapy humidifier with 3 humidification modes and real-time temperature display ping with three decorative plants and the tank lid is designed with feeding ports. The small fish tank not only decorates your indoor space, but also helps to relieve stress and improve your mood for a fun and rewarding experience

3-in-1 Efficient Circulation System: A self-cleaning fish tank equipped with a triple self-circulating silent pump for effortless filtration and cleaning, keeping the water crystal clear. The oxygenation outlet ensures ample oxygen supply for your fish, while ultra-quiet operation below 30dB guarantees a peaceful and comfortable environment for both you and your fish

Built-in Smart Humidification: The included aromatherapy extender comes with a smart three adjustable spray modes that allow customization of scent intervals and intensity. Enhance the ambiance of your room while maintaining the ideal humidity level for your space to feel relaxed

Ultra-Clear Viewing Experience: The small fish tank is made of high-quality 4mm ultra-high-definition glass, providing an excellent viewing experience with panoramic views to capture fish dynamics. Enhanced thickened non-slip base for long-lasting durability

Real-Time Temperature Display: The aquarium's built-in temperature detection and digital display makes it easy to monitor the water temperature, ensuring a safe and comfortable environment for your fish. The aquarium lid is designed with a feeding port, which makes feeding easy and prevents the fish from jumping out of the water

Warm Tip: To prevent the pump from burning out, please make sure the pump is fully submerged in water before plugging it in. Please place the other end of the oxygen tube and valve outside the tank and keep the tube dry to ensure oxygen can enter! Since the fish tank is a glass product, various problems may occur during transportation, assembly and use. If any problem occurs, please contact us immediately. We will provide you with technical guidance services to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase

name: Aqueon Fish Tank Aquarium Essentials Starter Kit for 10 Gallon Tanks
short_description: QUIETFLOW LED PRO POWER FILTER, filter cartridge, water conditioner and mesh fish net keep your aquarium water crystal-clear and your pet fish safe.
PRESET HEATER, SUCTION CUP and thermometer keep aquarium water at the 78° F setting to maintain the perfect water temperature.

AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES for your convenience. Choose from our 10-gallon, 20-gallon and 29-gallon options.
DEVELOPED BY AQUATIC HOBBYISTS, Aqueon provides a broad array of aquarium solutions to help maintain healthy aquatic environments.
product_description: Aqueon products are expertly designed to maintain a thriving environment for your aquatic pets. Aqueon’s Aquarium Essentials starter kit, suitable for any 10-gallon setup, provides everything you need to create the perfect underwater habitat. This comprehensive kit pairs with any saltwater or freshwater aquarium and includes an advanced filter, designed to deliver crystal-clear water by efficiently removing impurities. The precise heater, equipped with a secure suction mount, maintains a consistent 78° F, promoting an ideal habitat for your fish. Plus, this kit features a durable fish net for hassle-free maintenance and a reliable thermometer to monitor water conditions effortlessly. You’ll also benefit from food and water care samples to kickstart your aquarium experience. Available in 10-, 20-, and 29-gallon options, Aqueon empowers hobbyists and beginners alike to explore the wonders of aquatic life.

FISH BOWLS: Ultra-white glass, high light transmittance. Contains a load-bearing bottom plate, which is safer and more stable. The fish tank wall is visible from all sides, allowing you to enjoy the tank from any angle. The suspended filter box does not take up any space in the fish tank except for the water inlet pipe and heater
